thread.title: After rape, death threats, being called anti-national, Gurmehar Kaur flees Delhi
thread.title_full: After rape, death threats, being called anti-national, Gurmehar Kaur flees Delhi

author: FE Online
title: After rape, death threats, being called anti-national, Gurmehar Kaur flees Delhi
text:
After rape, death threats, being called anti-national, Gurmehar Kaur flees Delhi After rape, death threats, being called anti-national, Gurmehar Kaur flees Delhi Two days after hitting headlines and her video and comments going viral on the Internet, Lady Shri Ram College student and daughter of Kargil war martyr Capt Mandeep Singh, Gurmehar Kaur, 20, has fled Delhi. By: FE Online | Published:  37 PM Gurmehar Kaur (Source: Facebook/Gurmehar Kaur) 
Two days after hitting headlines and her video and comments going viral on the Internet, Lady Shri Ram College student and daughter of Kargil war martyr Capt Mandeep Singh, Gurmehar Kaur, 20, has fled Delhi. She was targetted for taking sides against the Akhil Bharatiya Vidyarthi Parishad (ABVP) after she accused the students’ organisation that is backed by the Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh (RSS) and the Bharatiya Janata Party ( BJP ) of trying to clamp down on freedom of speech when it tried to prevent Jawaharlal Nehru University (JNU) students from entering Ramjas College in Delhi University to attend a programme – some of these JNU students have been tagged as anti-national’. 
Gurmehar had objected to the unprecedented violence on the campus and put up a video of her’s in which she said that she was not ‘scared of the ABVP’. 
(Further inputs awaited)
